general.create:
command is used to create a file:
ex: create 'filename.txt'

dir:
	**** persons.txt ****
create 'hardware.txt'

dir:
	**** persons.txt ****
	**** hardware.txt ****
general.delete:
delete: command is used to delete a file:
ex: delete 'filename.txt'

dir:
	**** hardware.txt ****
	**** persons.txt ****
delete 'hardware.txt'

dir:
	**** persons.txt ****
general.rename:
rename: command is used to rename a file: 
ex: rename 'oldFileName' 'newFileName'

dir:
	**** persons.txt ****
	**** hardware.txt ****
rename 'hardware.txt' 'mikes_hardware.txt'

dir:
	**** persons.txt ****
	**** mikes_hardware.txt ****

info.create: create: This command is used create file <file_name>
info.delete: delete: This command is used to delete a file <file_name>
info.rename: rename: This command is used to rename a file <file_name> <new_file_name>
